docstring.long_description:
This block should also work with compatible Tektronix RSAXXX instruments.

Tested with RSA507a.
docstring.short_description: Extracts and returns the spectrum trace from an Tektronix RSA.

parameters.name: dll_file
parameters.description: Where the RSA_API.dll file is located.

parameters.name: ref_level
parameters.description: The reference level (the maximum y axis value), in dBm.

parameters.name: span
parameters.description: The width of the x axis, in Hz.
